title: Santino Traditional Coffee - 9kg
description: PRICE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST Experience the bold, nostalgic taste of Singapore's traditional Nanyang coffee. Expertly roasted with a unique blend of quality robusta beans, this rich, full-bodied coffee is enhanced with a touch of caramelised sugar and margarine for its signature aroma. Perfect for kopitiams, hawker stalls, cafes and retailers seeking authentic Southeast Asian flavours. Ideal for B2B supply and wholesale orders.

title: Santino Traditional Tea - 5kg
description: PRICE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST Discover the rich heritage of Singapore's traditional tea, crafted for the perfect cup of local "teh". Made from finely ground tea leaves, this blend delivers a robust, full-bodied flavour with a smooth finish. Perfect for pulling into classic teh tarik or brewing in bulk for food-service needs. A staple in kopitiams and hawker stalls, our tea brings authentic Southeast Asian tea culture to your business. Ideal for B2B supply and wholesale orders.

title: Santino Rainforest Reserve Blend (Rainforest Alliance Certified)
description: Rainforest Reserve is a dark roast blend crafted to evoke the energy and richness of the rainforest itself. Made with 100% Arabica beans sourced from Peru and Vietnam, this blend delivers a bold yet balanced profile that is both uplifting and deeply satisfying. With zesty notes of orange peel, a touch of dried raisin sweetness, and the warm richness of roasted almonds, Rainforest Reserve offers a full-bodied experience with low acidity. Perfect for those who appreciate a strong, comforting cup, this blend provides depth and vibrancy in every sip, honoring the lush ecosystems it helps protect. 100% Arabica Peru & Arabica Dark Roast Flavor Notes: Orange Peels, Dried Raisins, Roasted Almonds Low acidity; heavy body

title: CafÄ“va Espresso Machine Cleaning Powder
description: Deep Cleaning Action Active chlorine formula removes coffee stains effectively. Safe and Reliable Gentle, non-abrasive formula for all coffee equipment. Biodegradable & Eco-Friendly Environmentally responsible cleaner. Easy Rinse, No Residue Rinses clean, leaving equipment spotless. Instructions: Brew Head: Step 1 Place a blind filter in the portafilter and add 5g of cleaning powder. Step 2 Attach the portafilter to the brew head. Run the brew cycle for 7 seconds, pause for 7 seconds, and repeat 7 times. Step 3 Remove and rinse the portafilter under the brew head water stream. Step 4 Reinsert the portafilter without powder and run the brew cycle again. Step 5 Replace the blind filter with a filter basket and brew a cup of espresso to remove residue-discard. Parts and Accessories: Step 1 Mix 3-8g of cleaning powder with 0.5 liter of hot water (above 80Â°C). Step 2 Soak dirty components in the solution for 10 minutes.
